sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_2eb5ff67471f42103761bb30116d43a6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>IfscDetails</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

    // implement resource here
	var queryP = request.queryParams;
    var u_ifsc = queryP.u_ifsc;
	//var bankD = queryP.u_bank;
 
    var body =[];
 
    var gr = new GlideRecord('u_demo_rbi_data');
  gr.addQuery('u_ifsc', u_ifsc);
	//gr.addQuery('u_bank',bankD);
    gr.query();
 
    while (gr.next()) {
 
        var obj = {
            name: gr.getValue('u_bank'),
            state: gr.getValue('u_state'),
            std: gr.getValue('u_std_code'),
            branch: gr.getValue('u_branch')
        };
 
 
        body.push(obj);
 
    }
 
    response.setBody(body);
 
 
 


})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/708337/demo_bank</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-16 08:45:41</sys_created_on><sys_id>2eb5ff67471f42103761bb30116d43a6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>IfscDetails</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_2eb5ff67471f42103761bb30116d43a6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-17 09:23:13</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Demo_Bank">7f253fe3471f42103761bb30116d437a</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
